Slayer

press enter to start

Instructions

Objective:

Defeat all the monsters without letting your HP hit zero!

Controls:

Use the arrow keys to move around the map.

Walk over chests to open them.

Press enter to attack!

Hints:

Healing items and better weapons can be found in chests.

Defeat more monsters to level up for more damage!

Use your inventory to heal and select your active weapon.
